vote.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 10-1671, previously approved on June 23, 2010, for the Neighborhood Stabilization Program Statement to amend the target areas as defined in Attachment A to align with the Comprehensive Housing Policy Reinvestment Strategy Areas and Opportunity Zones - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
